data.name: Delilah
data.detailed_description:
Delilah is an old-school FPS set in a world divided between Humanity and Hell. Its main goal is to capture the magical formula of the great classics.



  • Two characters with unique loadouts
  • Varied encounters, from tight horror experiences to slaughter maps
  • Seven episodes (planned), each with a distinct theme and story
  • Authentic 2.5D graphics in 256 colors, multi-directional monster sprites
  • MIDI tunes emulating sounds straight from the 90's
  • Custom game engine that supports 3d and dynamic level geometry



A century ago a great hero has saved our species by closing the gates of Hell, but the billions of demons already on Earth didn't just magically disappear. Instead, while Humanity was slowly reconquering the planet, several Arch Devils have adapted to the rules of our dimension. They formed their own twisted governments (known as Circles), to use their populations as human shields.

Our two protagonists were born into this century-long cold war: one is an enforcer of the Transylvanian Daemocratic Circle, the other is an Anointed defender of Humanity.

About the developer

Borington is a one-person game development team from Transylvania. My previous games include 'BlackChain' and 'Rum & Gun', both available on Steam.

data.short_description: Eastern Europe is the newest Circle of Hell, but outside its walls things aren't much better. Relentless action, pixelated gore, 256 colors. That is Delilah. And yeah, it is inspired by other shooters starting with a 'D'.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Anything with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with WebGL
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Probably
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 3 GHz, 2 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with WebGL 2.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains low-fidelity depictions of gore and extreme violence against humans and demons.
